content: गणित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [गण्-क्त] {@--1@} Counted, numbered, calculated. {@--2@} Regarded, cared for &c.; see गण्. --तं {@--1@} Reckoning, calculating. {@--2@} The science of computation, mathematics; (it comprises पाटीगणित or व्यक्तगणित ‘arithmetic’, बीजगणित, ‘algebra’, and रेखागणित ‘geometry’); गणितमथ कलां वैशिकीं हस्तिशिक्षां ज्ञात्वा <ls>Mk. 1. 4.</ls> {@--3@} The sum of a progression. {@--4@} A sum (in general).
